title: DSS/RSS/EHVRS can be provided on the land of electric supply company or the requirement of land as specified above will have to be acquired /obtained as per the policy of Govt
clause_text: DSS/RSS/EHVRS can be provided on the land of electric supply company or the requirement of land as specified above will have to be acquired /obtained as per the policy of Govt. by concerned electric supply company.
